title: Worlds Apart
description: Plain weave with printed design. Thin warp, thick weft. Map of the world.  Pattern repeat, 92\".  Exmpl: South Am. is 30\" long. Plain weave with printed design. Thin warp, thick weft. Map of the world.  Water is blue. blue/green & white stripes.  Land is white. Pattern repeat, 92\".  Exmpl: South Am. is 30\" long. (blue/white)
